name: Crunchy Salmon Croquettes
author: Trinity
summary: I got this recipe from a former coworker who happened to be the best cook on this planet. Hope you enjoy the recipe as much as I do. Those croquettes taste wonderful on a mixed salad.
ingredients: 1 cup vegetable oil for frying, or more as needed
directions: Pour salmon juice into a small bowl or measuring cup
Place salmon in a mixing bowl; clean off skin and bones
Use your fingers or a fork to flake the salmon
Add egg and mix well; add flour and stir to combine
Add onion, bell pepper, and black pepper
Add baking powder to the salmon juice; beat with a fork until foamy
Pour into the salmon mixture and fold together
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook croquettes in batches until golden brown, about 5 minutes per batch
